title: Did I become a noob (Serious problem)
body:
Well, guys. Im here because I have a problem I think it's weird. 
About 2 weeks ago I had a lose streak and I got demoted from gold 3 to gold 5 and I got stuck there,
I started trying to improve, in few words I changed 
completely my play style.
I was a very aggressive player, tho I always had lots of kill, I died a lot, I never ward when I play mid and push like retard, etc..
Now I have more map awareness, I can ward Better, I die   less, I have more objective control etc
This is when the strange thing happened, I get less lp than before (14 win, 23 lose)tho I think I'm playing pretty much better than before, so I just don't get it.
Getting less lp means I have a lower mmr, what should I do?
Is it because the play style change? 

Mikcyi

I'm  Gold 4 now

replies.body:
OMG siete diventati tutti inglesi!!!
io sono legno 5 in inglese. AIUTO <{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

So remember, if u have a lose streak, probably the riot "try" to retroceed you. If you think u are going well, just win some games and riot will give you some lp more. Look at me: when i were silver, riot give me 14 lp for win and 23 for defeat, like you.
Now i am b3, but i'm having a good win streak and give me 20/23 lp for win and 15/20 lp for defeat.
Just try to win.
Did u think u help your team? Do u ward? Do u do some roam when u take an advantage on your opponent? **Do u take some turret for your team** (this is very important)**?** and do u do good calls? If you do tose thigs, u will win.
